languages.text: "Нет. Нет, так быть не может. Я сильнее этого. Наверняка... да, наверняка вы правы и голоса меня ведут в какую-то западню — с чего бы им хотеть запирать самих себя? Мы... мы обязательно найдем другой способ, да Лорд-капитан? Да, конечно же найдем..." {n}С каждым словом голос Идиры меркнет и тускнеет все больше, перерастая в совсем невнятное бормотание, пока, наконец, не затихает совсем.{/n}

"No. No, of course I won't die. I'm stronger than that. Yes... yes, you're probably right, the voices must be leading me into a trap — why would they want to shut themselves out, right? We'll... we'll find another way, won't we, Lord Captain? Of course we will..." {n}Idira's voice wilts with every word she speaks, turning into incoherent mumbling and eventually fading away completely.{/n}

Мы... мы обязательно найдем другой способ, да Лорд-капитан? Да, конечно же найдем..." {n}С каждым словом голос Идиры меркнет и тускнеет все больше, перерастая в совсем невнятное бормотание, пока, наконец, не затихает совсем.{/n}

Of course we will..." {n}Idira's voice wilts with every word she speaks, turning into incoherent mumbling and eventually fading away completely.{/n}

We'll... we'll find another way, won't we, Lord Captain? Of course we will..." {n}Idira's voice wilts with every word she speaks, turning into incoherent mumbling and eventually fading away completely.{/n}

languages.text: “不，不，我怎么会死呢？我比这要坚强得多。没错……或许你说得没错，这些声音肯定是打算把我引到陷阱里。毕竟，它们可不想把自己关在门外面，是吧？我们……我们一定能找到别的办法，你说是吧，舰长大人？我们肯定能……”{n}伊迪拉每说出一个字，她的声音就弱了一分。到最后，她的话语变成了语无伦次的喃喃自语，最终完全陷入了沉默。{/n}
languages.original_text: "No. No, of course I won't die. I'm stronger than that. Yes... yes, you're probably right, the voices must be leading me into a trap — why would they want to shut themselves out, right? We'll... we'll find another way, won't we, Lord Captain? Of course we will..." {n}Idira's voice wilts with every word she speaks, turning into incoherent mumbling and eventually fading away completely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “不，不，我怎么会死呢？我比这要坚强得多。没错……或许你说得没错，这些声音肯定是打算把我引到陷阱里。毕竟，它们可不想把自己关在门外面，是吧？我们……我们一定能找到别的办法，你说是吧，舰长大人？我们肯定能……”{n}伊迪拉每说出一个字，她的声音就弱了一分。到最后，她的话语变成了语无伦次的喃喃自语，最终完全陷入了沉默。{/n}

languages.text: «No. No, claro que no moriré. Puedo soportarlo sin problema. Sí... sí, creo que tiene razón, las voces deben de estar guiándome a una trampa; ¿por qué iban a querer bloquearse el paso ellas mismas? Encontraremos... alguna otra solución, ¿verdad, Lord Capitán? No hay duda...». {n}La voz de Idira se debilita con cada palabra hasta convertirse en un murmullo incoherente y, finalmente, perderse por completo.{/n}
languages.original_text: "No. No, of course I won't die. I'm stronger than that. Yes... yes, you're probably right, the voices must be leading me into a trap — why would they want to shut themselves out, right? We'll... we'll find another way, won't we, Lord Captain? Of course we will..." {n}Idira's voice wilts with every word she speaks, turning into incoherent mumbling and eventually fading away completely.{/n}

Sí... sí, creo que tiene razón, las voces deben de estar guiándome a una trampa; ¿por qué iban a querer bloquearse el paso ellas mismas? Encontraremos... alguna otra solución, ¿verdad, Lord Capitán? No hay duda...». {n}La voz de Idira se debilita con cada palabra hasta convertirse en un murmullo incoherente y, finalmente, perderse por completo.{/n}

languages.text: "Nein. Nein, natürlich werde ich nicht sterben. Dafür bin ich zu stark. Ja ... Ja, Ihr habt vermutlich recht, die Stimmen führen mich gewiss in eine Falle. Warum sollten sie sich selbst ausschließen wollen, nicht wahr? Wir ... wir finden einen anderen Weg, oder, Lord Captain? Natürlich tun wir das ..." {n}Idiras Stimme wird mit jedem Wort schwächer, verkommt zu einem unverständlichen Gemurmel und verstummt schließlich völlig.{/n}
languages.original_text: "No. No, of course I won't die. I'm stronger than that. Yes... yes, you're probably right, the voices must be leading me into a trap — why would they want to shut themselves out, right? We'll... we'll find another way, won't we, Lord Captain? Of course we will..." {n}Idira's voice wilts with every word she speaks, turning into incoherent mumbling and eventually fading away completely.{/n}

Natürlich tun wir das ..." {n}Idiras Stimme wird mit jedem Wort schwächer, verkommt zu einem unverständlichen Gemurmel und verstummt schließlich völlig.{/n}

languages.text: 「ううん、死ぬわけないわ。あたいはもっと強いもの。そうよ…きっとあなたの言う通りよ。あの声はあたいを罠にハメようとしているに違いないわ。だって自分たちから閉じこもるなんて変だもの。きっとあたいたちなら…他の方法を見つけられる。そうでしょう、ロード・キャプテン？絶対に…」{n}イディラの声は言葉を発するたびに小さくなり、支離滅裂なつぶやきに変わり、やがて完全に消えた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "No. No, of course I won't die. I'm stronger than that. Yes... yes, you're probably right, the voices must be leading me into a trap — why would they want to shut themselves out, right? We'll... we'll find another way, won't we, Lord Captain? Of course we will..." {n}Idira's voice wilts with every word she speaks, turning into incoherent mumbling and eventually fading away completely.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ううん、死ぬわけないわ。あたいはもっと強いもの。そうよ…きっとあなたの言う通りよ。あの声はあたいを罠にハメようとしているに違いないわ。だって自分たちから閉じこもるなんて変だもの。きっとあたいたちなら…他の方法を見つけられる。そうでしょう、ロード・キャプテン？絶対に…」{n}イディラの声は言葉を発するたびに小さくなり、支離滅裂なつぶやきに変わり、やがて完全に消えた。{/n}

languages.text: « Non. Non, bien sûr que je ne mourrai pas. Je suis plus forte que ça. Oui... vous avez sans doute raison, les voix doivent m'attirer dans un piège. Pourquoi accepteraient-elles de se taire autrement ? Nous... nous trouverons un autre moyen, n'est-ce pas, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine} ? Oui, bien sûr que nous trouverons... » {n}La voix d'Idira s'estompe peu à peu pour se transformer en marmonnements incohérents avant de devenir totalement inaudible.{/n}
languages.original_text: "No. No, of course I won't die. I'm stronger than that. Yes... yes, you're probably right, the voices must be leading me into a trap — why would they want to shut themselves out, right? We'll... we'll find another way, won't we, Lord Captain? Of course we will..." {n}Idira's voice wilts with every word she speaks, turning into incoherent mumbling and eventually fading away completely.{/n}

Oui, bien sûr que nous trouverons... » {n}La voix d'Idira s'estompe peu à peu pour se transformer en marmonnements incohérents avant de devenir totalement inaudible.{/n}

languages.text: "Hayır. Hayır, ölmeyeceğim. Güçlüyüm ben. Evet... Haklısın, evet. Sesler beni tuzağa çekmeye çalışıyor olmalı. Neden susmak istesinler ki zaten, değil mi? Başka bir yolunu buluruz, değil mi Lord Kaptan? Buluruz tabii ya..." {n}İdira'nın sesi, söylediği her kelimeyle birlikte kısılarak anlaşılmaz bir mırıltıya dönüşüyor ve sonrasında tamamen sessizleşiyor.{/n}

Of course we will..." {n}Idira's voice wilts with every word she speaks, turning into incoherent mumbling and eventually fading away completely.{/n}

Başka bir yolunu buluruz, değil mi Lord Kaptan?
